docs.lead_paragraph: It’s not uncommon for new mothers to experience depression, which is usually attributed to hormonal fluctuations and lack of sleep after childbirth. But new research shows that depression after the arrival of a child isn’t limited to birth parents: adoptive parents are also at risk for depression after bringing a child home.
docs.abstract: Depression after the arrival of a child isn’t limited to birth parents — adoptive parents also are at risk of depression after bringing a child home.
docs.snippet: Depression after the arrival of a child isn’t limited to birth parents — adoptive parents also are at risk of depression after bringing a child home.

docs.lead_paragraph: When I was pregnant, I made a vow that no matter how much poundage I piled on I would not devolve into one of those slovenly sweat-pants-wearing preggos that you see waddling down the street leaving a trail of Saltine crumbs. Making an effort, after all, is what separates us from the animals, and nowhere is this truer than during that distinctly mammalian experience of childbirth. Even when I could no longer see my toes, I could rest assured that they were freshly pedicured.
docs.abstract: Amy Tara Koch, former Mademoiselle staffer and current mother of two daughters, offers a guide to a stylish gestation period.
docs.snippet: Amy Tara Koch, former Mademoiselle staffer and current mother of two daughters, offers a guide to a stylish gestation period.

docs.lead_paragraph: Among the many provisions in the law are an excise tax on indoor tanning and money for abstinence programs.

headline.seo: Health Care Law Includes Some Surprises
headline.main: In All Those Pages, a Surprise or Two
headline.print_headline: In All Those Pages, a Surprise or Two

docs.lead_paragraph: 9 P.M. (LIFETIME) DOWN WITH LOVE (2003) A homage to the old Doris Day-Rock Hudson films of the 1960s. Barbara Novak (Renée Zellweger, above, with Ewan McGregor) is an author who has just completed a book that argues for professional and sexual equality for men and women. Catcher Block (Mr. McGregor), a men's magazine writer, decides to challenge himself by writing an exposé of Novak while simultaneously making her fall in love with him. In his review in The New York Times, A. O. Scott wrote: ''Eve Ahlert and Dennis Drake, the screenwriters, have shaken together a canny cocktail of period vernacular and deliberately labored double entendres, some of which extend for entire scenes. The best moments have a glorious, hectic artificiality, emphasized by split screens, gimmicky editing and the obviously cardboard three-quarter moon that bobs in the ersatz Manhattan sky.'' 7 A.M. (ABC) GOOD MORNING AMERICA Usher performs, and the Iranian-American freelance journalist Roxana Saberi, who was released from prison in Iran last year, is a guest.
